local_intent: Transfer: re-detect red_plate, move above and align, lower until contact to place the white plate, open to release, verify release, and retreat.
assumptions: white_plate is currently held by the gripper after the pick step
red_plate remains within reachable workspace and can be re-detected
coherence_with_global: Consistent with GLOBAL_BT and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION: realizes the transfer phase by moving above the red plate, precise alignment, contact-based placement, gentle release, and retreat to a safe pose. Includes re-perception for robustness.
